title: Chapter 662 - Breaking And Flourishing
volume_title: A Sword Suppresses Thirty Thousand Years
body:
Chapter 662 - Breaking And Flourishing

The tribulation clouds churned, scattering electrical light. Heaven and earth trembled.

Su Yi stood in midair.

A perfect cycle of the light of the Grand Dao revolved behind him. He was transcendent and aloof.

The power of the third layer was roughly comparable to the final layer of my Tribulation of Spiritual Manifestation in my past life, thought Su Yi. 

But before he could give the matter any further thought—

Boom!

The fourth layer of the lightning tribulation was already upon him. A bolt of fiery lightning descended from deep within the tribulation clouds.

It was like an electric sea of molten lava pouring down from the heavens.

This terrifying power far surpassed the third layer of the tribulation!

Su Yi’s eyebrows rose slightly, and his expression turned slightly solemn.

He could sense a real threat!

His body and mind both felt stifled.

Despite this, he laughed and suddenly shot upward.

Whoosh!

He fully extended his body, and the revolving cycle of the Grand Dao formed of three types of peerless Dao Charm—the five elements, Yin and Yang, and wind and lightning—rumbled and burst with intense light.

Su Yi chose to clash with the lightning head-on once more!
